MajorClaims.MC1: wild animals should be set free from zoos
MajorClaims.MC2: animals should live in natural habitats instead of zoos

Claims.C1: it is our responsibility to create a natural and safe environment for animals to live in
Claims.C2: zoos are more likely to be a killer rather than a protector in protecting wild lives
Claims.C3: zoos, which are equipped with modern facilities and professionals, would provide better care for the animals inside
Claims.C4: they have the right to enjoy freedom but they also escape from isolation and depression

Premises.P1: it is the right of wild species to live in a environment away from human beings
Premises.P2: Given the fact that human beings are responsible for the heavy pollution and severe damage to the natural habitats of many wild animals
Premises.P3: the wild species would suffer from isolation and depression
Premises.P4: if rural animals are captured in the zoo for a long period, it would have negative influences on both the physical and psychological status of the creatures
Premises.P5: the limited space and the artificial trees and lakes can not fully compensate the animals for their loss
Premises.P6: the endangered species preserved in zoos would never die of illegal hunting
Premises.P7: the strict laws prohibiting poaching would provide a shelter for various kinds of animals in natural habitat
Premises.P8: the growing number of natural habitat would be the ultimate solution of saving wild animals worldwide
